UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user of the application, who can be a buyer or a business owner.

uid.description: The unique ID of the user, from Firebase Authentication.

fullName.description: The full name of the user, applicable if the role is 'buyer'.

businessName.description: The name of the business, applicable to business roles.

category.description: The primary business category, applicable to business roles.

address.description: The user's or business's full street address.

city.description: The city where the user or business is located.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the user profile was created.

isAdmin.description: Flag to indicate if the user is an administrator.

purchaseHistory.description: A list of product purchase records for buyers.

purchaseId.description: The 14-digit unique identification number for the purchase.

ghostCoins.description: The number of Ghost Coins earned by the buyer.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product line or brand offered by a business.

id.description: The unique ID of the product.

userId.description: The UID of the business owner who listed the product.

name.description: The name of the product line or brand.

description.description: A detailed description of the product.

category.description: The category the product belongs to, inherited from the user's profile.

inventory.description: The total inventory count for the product line.

varieties.description: A list of different varieties for this product.

ProductVariety.title: Product Variety
ProductVariety.description: Represents a specific variation of a product, like size, color, or flavor.

id.description: A unique ID for the variety.

name.description: The name of the specific variety (e.g., 'Large', 'Red').

image.description: A URL to the image of the variety, stored in Firebase Storage.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a business or product category.

icon.description: The name of the lucide-react icon to display.

href.description: The link for the category page.

order.description: The display order of the category.
